forecast.day_comments: A 40 percent chance of snow, mainly between 11am and 5pm.  Partly sunny, with a high near 33. Wind chill values between 20 and 29. South southeast wind 5 to 7 mph becoming southwest in the afternoon.  Total daytime snow accumulation of less than a half inch possible.
forecast.night_comments: A slight chance of snow before midnight, then a chance of snow after 4am.  Mostly cloudy, with a low around 21. Wind chill values between 14 and 19. Southwest wind 5 to 7 mph.  Chance of precipitation is 30%. New snow accumulation of less than a half inch possible.
